events.text: It seems this used to be a medical facility
A big portion of the medical supplies are very rustic, developed locally, probably made out of the local flora and fauna.
Weirdly enough part of the equipment is of really high technology, i wonder where they got all of this from, judging by the ammount i would say, wherever it's from, there must be more.
We found some med-kits, and they looked new, maybe they got them from that printer on the central plaza.
